author: Tracy Law
title: Coronavirus fear and frustration can give way to gratitude and even hope. It has in Hong Kong. - NBC News
description: Coronavirus fear and frustration can give way to gratitude and even hope. It has in Hong Kong. NBC News Get Used to It: This Lockdown Won’t Be the Last The Atlantic Simple DIY masks could help flatten the curve. We should all wear them in public. The Washingt…
content:
Fear, frustration, boredom, resignation, perspective, gratitude, hope: This is the cycle of emotions that we have been going through in Hong Kong since the first case of coronavirus was identified in our city in late January.
We first feared the unknown, the… [+6226 chars]
